Mesh

class Mesh

Bases: handle

MESH General mesh class, can be subclassed for specialized types

Property Summary
cartGrid = false

Flag for Cartesian grids

cellNumVerts

Number of nodes for each 3D element

cellRegions

Regions

cellTag

3D elements’ tag (region)

cellVTKType

3D element VTK type tag

cells

Cell to node mapping: 3D elements’ nodes sequences

coordinates

Nodes’ coordinates

edgeTag

1D elements’ tag (region)

edges

Edge to node mapping (Required for 2D problems): 1D elements’ nodes sequences

nCellTag

Number of elements’ tag

nCells = 0

Total number of mesh 3D elements

nDim = 0

GENERAL INFO: Mesh dimension

nEdges = 0

Total number of mesh 1D elements

nNodes = 0

Total number of mesh nodes

nSurfaceTag

Number of surfaces’ tag

nSurfaces = 0

Total number of mesh 2D elements

surfaceNumVerts

Number of nodes of the 2D element

surfaceTag

2D elements’ tag (region)

surfaceVTKType

2D element VTK type tag

surfaces

Surface to node mapping: 2D elements’ nodes sequences

Method Summary
createCartesianGrid(dim, deg, varargin)

Generate Cartesian mesh of quadrilateral elements

getSurfaceMesh(surfTag)

Function to build a 2D mesh object based on the surfaceTag of a 3D mesh initialize Mesh object

importGMSHmesh(fileName)

Reading input file

importVTKmesh(fileName)

reading VTK file using VTK toolkit
